originalText.text: They are not serious with their words. I went in there for a an interview and was told to have sit by Anthony Gaurdian. While I was sitting there he asked me to fill out the application and he told me the guy that is interviewing you is coming and I never saw that guy. Anthony end up interviewing me and was nice when you meet him‚Ä¶but that is when you meet him because after the interview he told what experience I have I told him, he asked what hours and locations I will like to work I tell him. So he promises me a pay rate of $18-$19 from the experience I have had. He took picture of my green card which I thought was weird. After finishing the interview he told me the scheduling guy will reach out to me regarding scheduling and if they don‚Äôt to not think that is a bad thing it probably would be they‚Äôre busy. He Also said too me  too send him a text on Friday if I don‚Äôt receive a schedule so he can help me regarding scheduling. I have texted him since last Friday till this day he haven‚Äôt responded to me nor tell me what happened. If you are not going too hiring someone is good too tell them on the sport you are not what we are looking for there is nothing wrong with that at all. I don‚Äôt mind being told that because I can moved on too the next step and  at the end of the given up is not a option for me. I am born too be told no and I know that in life you wouldn‚Äôt get everything all the time. But honesty and the truth set you free and it is what keep your company going. Always be kind, honest and trustworthy that‚Äôs how the world should work. Don‚Äôt promise people when you know you are not going to do what you said. Don‚Äôt give hopes when you know you are not going to provide what you said. üôèüôèüôè

originalText.text: They ensure that no one is on the site after hours and that everyone during hours belongs there. We can relax knowing someone is always watching. Private Security Guard Service keeps all of our job sites safe.

text.text: They ensure that no one is on the site after hours and that everyone during hours belongs there. We can relax knowing someone is always watching. Private Security Guard Service keeps all of our job sites safe.

originalText.text: We could never operate a secure construction project without the construction security services of Private Security Guard Service. Theft has always been a costly problem in our business. It occurs from both the inside and the outside. With proper construction security it is reduced to a minimum saving us a lot of money in the long run. Private Security Guard Service is a necessary entity in today construction industry.

Private Security Guard Service is a necessary entity in today construction industry.

originalText.text: We use Private Security Guard Service to protect our premise from theft. Wire and pipe has a lot of value in the scrap market and thieves are always looking for a place to get it. Private Security Guard Service  makes sure they do not get it from our projects.

originalText.text: This is the security firm supplying uniformed officers at the main NYC Post Offices.  Most are professional, and timely. This year we had 2 officers resign because they had to do dble sifts on multiple occasions.
